direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods process strings and involve encoding operations, specifically URL encoding.
Both methods handle string concatenation and involve similar control flows, though they operate on different types of data.
The buildFullUrl method relies on the urlEncode method to encode parameters, indicating a strong dependency.
The buildStreamUrl method indirectly relies on the urlEncode method through the joinStreamUrls method, indicating a dependency.
Both methods access and manipulate shared resources, specifically the DecimalFormat instance used for formatting.
